function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of ineffective epidemic suppression due to school and university closures","Impact":"Increased transmission and inability to suppress the epidemic","Mitigation":"Implementing other complementary strategies along with school closure","Technologies":"Population-wide social distancing","People":"Students, teachers, and staff","Owner":"Government and educational institutions"},{"Description":"Timing of interventions for mitigation and suppression strategies","Impact":"Ineffective response to epidemic due to incorrect timing of interventions","Mitigation":"Developing clear guidelines for the timing of interventions based on the nature of the epidemic","Technologies":"Surveillance systems for tracking hospital admissions","People":"Public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities and government"},{"Description":"Delay in seeing the impact of interventions on hospitalised case numbers","Impact":"Difficulty in evaluating the effectiveness of interventions due to delayed impact","Mitigation":"Implementing more rapid testing and surveillance systems","Technologies":"Rapid testing systems","People":"Healthcare workers, public health authorities","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health authorities"}]}
